analyzed: om namaḥ cidbhairavāya

original: citibhūmisamāśrayaṇāś citibhūtiṃ śrayata mā mudhā bhramata /
analyzed: citi bhūmi samāśrayaṇāḥ citi bhūtim śrayata mā mudhā bhramata

original: prathayann iti bhaktimatāṃ jayati śivo 'nugrahapravaṇaḥ // KsBhAS_1
analyzed: prathayan iti bhaktimatām jayati śivaḥ anugraha pravaṇaḥ

original: cidbhairavam eva paraṃ paramāmṛtarūpam ekam atidīptam /
analyzed: cit bhairavam eva param parama amṛta rūpam ekam ati dīptam
ullasita karaṇa cakra grasta samastam śivam vande

original: stutyaḥ stotā stutir iti yad api vibhinnaṃ na kiṃcid astīha /
analyzed: stutyaḥ stotā stutiḥ iti yat api vibhinnam na kiṃcid asti iha

original: mṛṣati yathā yad rūpaṃ cidrūpatayā tathā bhavaty etat // KsBhAS_3
analyzed: mṛṣati yathā yat rūpam cit rūpa tayā tathā bhavati etat ksbhas
vigalita sarva vibhedam sarva vibheda ātma cidghana ānandam

original: yat tava tattvaṃ bhagavaṃs tasyānukṛtiṃ tvadākṛtiṃ vande // KsBhAS_4
analyzed: yat tava tat tvam bhagavan tasya anukṛtim tvad ākṛtim vande
rekhā puruṣaḥ puruṣam varṇa lipiḥ varṇa saṃcayam yadvat

original: tadvat vicitrarūpaṃ tvām ākāro vyanakti paramātman // KsBhAS_5
analyzed: tadvat vicitra rūpam tvām ākāraḥ vyanakti paramātman
tatra avikalpam eva tvām cit rūpam samāviśya

original: vimṛśāmaḥ kim api manāṅ na hi tattvaṃ kalpanāviṣayaḥ // KsBhAS_6
analyzed: vimṛśāmaḥ kim api manāk na hi tattvam kalpanā viṣayaḥ
sva ātma prabhām vidhāya vāgdevīm viṣaya kusuma kḷpta arcaḥ

original: prathamonmeṣaṃ gurum atha vanditvā hṛdayam āviśya // KsBhAS_7
analyzed: prathama unmeṣam gurum atha vanditvā hṛdayam āviśya

original: staumi vimṛśan maheśvaram ātmānaṃ svaṃ cidekaghanam /
analyzed: staumi vimṛśan maheśvaram ātmānam svam cit eka ghanam
srāvita pāśa kadambakam etasmin deha devagṛhe
citi ānanda icchā vid karaṇa ākhyāḥ śaktayaḥ jayanti vibho
sūkṣma sthūla bhidā āptā vaktra tvam brahmamuṇḍa abhidhā

original: sakalaṃ sadāśivāntaṃ pretātmatayā tavāsanaṃ svāmin // KsBhAS_10
analyzed: sakalam sadāśiva antam preta ātma tayā tava āsanam svāmin
parama prakāśa vapuṣaḥ vimarśa śaktiḥ prabho parā devī

original: asyā eva prasaraḥ sarvā brāhmyādikā devyaḥ // KsBhAS_11
analyzed: asyāḥ eva prasaraḥ sarvāḥ brāhmī ādikāḥ devyaḥ
dahana jala amṛta lekhā viṣa ādi bibhrat tvam ādiśasi etat

original: viśvaṃ viruddham api saccidrūpe mayi virudhyate naitat // KsBhAS_12
analyzed: viśvam viruddham api sat cit rūpe mayi virudhyate na etat
saṃvid sūtra nilīnaḥ niḥsāraḥ mātṛ nivahaḥ ayam
karaṇa muṇḍa māla bhārin darśayasi iti iva naḥ svāmin

original: paśyata paśyata pāśā viṣamās ta ime bahiṣkṛtāḥ śaśvat /
analyzed: paśyata paśyata pāśāḥ viṣamāḥ te ime bahiṣkṛtāḥ śaśvat

original: ity antradhāraṇamiṣat kathayaṃs tvaṃ naḥ samābhāsi // KsBhAS_14
analyzed: iti antra dhāraṇa miṣat kathayan tvam naḥ samābhāsi

original: māyāpaṭaḥ sarāgo vyomni pare 'smin sa eṣa nikṣiptaḥ /
analyzed: māyā paṭaḥ sa rāgaḥ vyomni pare asmin saḥ eṣa nikṣiptaḥ

original: iti gajacarma saraktaṃ mūrdhni vahan kathayasīśa // KsBhAS_15
analyzed: iti gaja carma sa raktam mūrdhni vahan kathayasi īśa
antar śakti kṛpāṇīm vyanakṣi saṃsṛti vibhedinīm asinā
nija śakti mahima svīkṛta samasta viśvāḥ hi vīra varāḥ
bhava bhaya hantā saḥ aham sānāthye avasthitaḥ asmi mā bhaiṣṭa

original: ity āsphoṭitakheṭakadarśanato diśasi naḥ svāmin // KsBhAS_17
analyzed: iti āsphoṭita kheṭaka darśanataḥ diśasi naḥ svāmin
nija śakti pāśa valitaḥ cit vapuṣā kalyate mayā kālaḥ

original: iti pāśadhāraṇavaśāt prathayasi naḥ kālakālas tvam // KsBhAS_18
analyzed: iti pāśa dhāraṇa vaśāt prathayasi naḥ kāla kālaḥ tvam
bheda mayam akhilam etat nija śaktyā evā ākṣipāmi saṃhartum
iti aṅkuśa dhāraṇataḥ sphuṭayati para bhairavaḥ asmākam
kodaṇḍa arūdha śara pradarśanāt brahma viṣṇu rudra īśān

original: sasadākhyaśivāñ chaktyā kāraṇahariṇaṃ bhinatsi mṛgavat tvam // KsBhAS_20
analyzed: sa sat ākhya śivām śaktyā kāraṇa hariṇam bhinatsi mṛga vat tvam
vara dena pāṇinā tvam viśva vibhūti prada tvam abhinayasi

original: na khalu paratattvaniṣṭho vibhavamalaiḥ spṛśyate jātu // KsBhAS_21
analyzed: na khalu para tattva niṣṭhaḥ vibhava malaiḥ spṛśyate jātu

original: abhayena ca bhavabhayāni unmūlayatā prakāśyate satatam /
analyzed: abhayena ca bhava bhayāni unmūlayatā prakāśyate satatam
viśva anugraha kāraṇa svabhāva tā tava kara talena
akhyāti rūpam asamam māyāyāḥ śakalitam śiraḥ atra etat

original: parabodhamayena mayā muṇḍaṃ bibhrat prakāśayasy evam // KsBhAS_23
analyzed: para bodha mayena mayā muṇḍam bibhrat prakāśayasi evam
niḥśeṣa hṛta sārā mayi eva jagat sthitiḥ cit eka ghane
iti khaṭvāṅga karaṅka udvahana chalataḥ dadāsi ājñām
vīṇā ghaṇtā ḍamarūn uḍḍāmara vādayan idam diśasi
vṛtti tri bheda bhinnam nādam śṛṇvan sthitaḥ asmi iti
kim ca parā ādika śakti tritaya ārā sundarām mahā śaktim

original: devānukaroṣi bahis triśūladhāraṇamiṣeṇa nityaṃ tvam // KsBhAS_26
analyzed: deva anukaroṣi bahis triśūla dhāraṇa miṣeṇa nityam tvam
icchā ādika nija śakti prakāśita adhas stha gocara tritayām

original: svām eva parāṃ śaktiṃ vajramayīṃ vahasi ṣaḍarāṃ tvam // KsBhAS_27
analyzed: svām eva parām śaktim vajra mayīm vahasi ṣaṣ arām tvam

original: jagad akhilaṃ macchaktyā damitaṃ sarvavyāvasthitīr dhatte /
analyzed: jagat akhilam mad śaktyā damitam sarva vyāvasthitīḥ dhatte
iti daṇḍa dhāraṇa vaśāt vyanakṣi cit bhairava asmākam
mudgara paraśū bibhrat baindava nāda anukāra rūpau tvam
bheda vibhedana śakalana para tvam īśāna nirdiśasi

original: darśanabhedāt svāminn anyānyām āhṛtiṃ dadhānas tvam /
analyzed: darśana bhedāt svāmin anya anyām āhṛtim dadhānaḥ tvam
bhairava para bodha mayam prathayasi nija dhāma sarvatra

original: śāktāṇḍakhaṇḍamadhye viśvarasāḥ sarvam ahaṃ pibāmi sadā /
analyzed: śākta aṇḍa khaṇḍa madhye viśvarasāḥ sarvam aham pibāmi sadā

original: vyañjayasi narakapālagarudhiramiṣād etad iva me 'ntaḥ // KsBhAS_31
analyzed: vyañjayasi naraka pālaga rudhira miṣāt etat iva me antar
abhimāna hṛdaya bandha an utkhātau tau imau sa śikhau

original: mūrtāv iva muṇdābjau prathayan dhatse mahākālaḥ // KsBhAS_32
analyzed: mūrtau iva muṇda abjau prathayan dhatse mahākālaḥ
akhila jagat bīja bhuvam prathama sthām anukaroṣi bodha nidhe
kara tala ga bījapūraka darśana līlāyitāt deva

original: bhairavarūpo 'py asi yat tatrāpi kare 'kṣamālikāṃ dhatse /
analyzed: bhairava rūpaḥ api asi yat tatra api kare akṣa mālikām dhatse

original: tat sarvākṣavikāsād viśvaṃ parivartayasy antaḥ // KsBhAS_34
analyzed: tat sarva akṣa vikāsāt viśvam parivartayasi antar

original: viśvaṃ brahmamayatvāc chuddham itīśaḥ samādiśasi // KsBhAS_35
analyzed: viśvam brahma maya tvāt śuddham iti īśaḥ samādiśasi

original: svātmārāmamayānāṃ viṣamā api viṣayabudbudhāḥ kim amī /
analyzed: sva ātma ārāma mayānām viṣamāḥ api viṣaya budbudhāḥ kim amī

original: smaradahanam alikanayanam prathayan paramāgnirūpam ādiśasi // KsBhAS_36
analyzed: smara dahanam alika nayanam prathayan parama agni rūpam ādiśasi
antar nibaddha lakṣyaḥ pravikāsi karaṇaḥ api yat sadā bhavasi

original: tat prathayasi sarvadaśaṃ gatamohakalaṅkam ātmānam // KsBhAS_37
analyzed: tat prathayasi sarva daśam gata moha kalaṅkam ātmānam

original: deva digambaratā te vadati nirāvaraṇam ātmano rūpam /
analyzed: deva digambara tā te vadati nirāvaraṇam ātmanaḥ rūpam
paramabrahma maya arkāt māyā āvaraṇam katham vṛṇuyāt
saṃhartā sarveṣām arka ādīnām aham tamaḥ bhūmiḥ
nirmala śārada gagana prabheṇa vapuṣā iti darśayasi
parama brahma mayaḥ tvam deva yadā āśrayasi bhairava ākāram

original: tat prathayasi tattvajñaḥ saty api bhede vimukta iti // KsBhAS_40
analyzed: tat prathayasi tattva jñaḥ sati api bhede vimuktaḥ iti
vividha śmaśāna mālā vetāla āvṛtaḥ prakāśayase
saṃvitti viṣaya kalanā madhyaḥ citibhairavaḥ asmi iti
tvayi eva amṛtalekhā para śakti mayī para pramātā atas

original: nātha tvam eva jagatām jīvanam iti bhāsi no hṛdaye // KsBhAS_42
analyzed: nātha tvam eva jagatām jīvanam iti bhāsi naḥ hṛdaye
tava śabdarāśi vapuṣaḥ pratyaṣṭakam eva bāhya parivāraḥ
para sūkṣma ādi vibhedāt bhairava loka īśvara pramukhāḥ
mudrayati nikhilam etat niḥśeṣa sva svarūpa saṃkramaṇāt
modayati bhakta vargam gati mudam pūrṇa tā prathanāt

original: mocayati pāśajālaṃ drāvayati vibhedam īśa te mūrtiḥ /
analyzed: mocayati pāśa jālam drāvayati vibhedam īśa te mūrtiḥ

original: mudrayati vividhasaṃviddraviṇaṃ mudrā tataḥ kathitā // KsBhAS_45
analyzed: mudrayati vividha saṃvid draviṇam mudrā tatas kathitā
jayati para tattva bhūmi pravare nipāya bhūtā eṣa

original: sphuṭam adhivasatu satattvaprathayā hṛdayasya meyamalam // KsBhAS_46
analyzed: sphuṭam adhivasatu sa tattva prathayā hṛdayasya meya malam

original: pratikalam udeti saṃvid yā kila tatra sphuraty adho viśvam /
analyzed: pratikalam udeti saṃvid yā kila tatra sphurati adhas viśvam
śiva śakti vibhava rūpam jānanti maheśa yāga sthāḥ

original: itthaṃ sphurasi sadā me cidbhairava sarvabhūtātma /
analyzed: ittham sphurasi sadā me cit bhairava sarva bhūta ātma

original: tad yāgādijapāntaṃ sampannam ayatnataḥ sarvam // KsBhAS_48
analyzed: tat yāga ādi japa antam sampannam ayatnataḥ sarvam
iti śrī mahā māheśvara ācārya śrī kṣemarāja viracitam bhairavānukaraṇa stotram samāptam
